廝.definition: (bound form) together; each other; (bound form) male servant; (bound form) dude; so-and-so (used in 那廝|那厮[na4 si1] and 這廝|这厮[zhe4 si1])

廝守.definition: to stay together; to rely on one another

廝打.definition: to come to blows; to tussle

廝搏.definition: to come to blows; to fight; to tussle

廝殺.definition: to fight at close quarters; to fight tooth and nail

廝混.definition: (derog.) to hang out (with sb); to mix (things) together
